start.text: You wake up in a dark forest. Two paths lie ahead.

left_path.text: You meet a wise old man. He offers you a gift.

right_path.text: A wild beast blocks your way.

gift_accepted.text: The gift gives you powers. You live happily ever after. THE END.

gift_declined.text: The old man curses you. You turn into a tree. THE END.

fight_beast.text: You defeat the beast and find treasure. THE END.

run_away.text: You escape safely but empty-handed. THE END.
